
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
 unsigned long n,q,p;
 cin>>n>>q;
 unsigned long arr[n];
 for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    cin>>arr[i];
    sort(arr,arr+n);

 for(int i=0;i<q;i++)
 {
     cin>>p;

         if(p>=arr[0] && p<=arr[n-1])
         {
             cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
         }
        else
        {
            cout<<"No"<<endl;
        }
 }
}
